No.text: Reassess continuously during transport for respiratory distress
Reassess continuously during transport for respiratory distress

Yes_3.text:
Give epinephrine 1:1000 3mL in nebulizer
Immediately assess for respiratory failure.

No_2.text:
Reassess continuously during transport
Further orders per
Online Medical Control

Reassess continuously during transport
Further orders per
Online Medical Control

Yes_4.text:
Perform BVM Ventilation
Normal saline (weight *20)ml/kg bolus IV/IO

Is_BVM_effective?.text:
If BVM is not effective, perform the following:
Reposition the airway
Check correct mask size
Check O2 source
Place
OPA
Assess for gastric distention
Transport, monitor and continue to reassess
If continued failure to ventilate or oxygenate with BVM, then place endotracheal tube or supraglottic airway
Contact medical control for further orders
